MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L33 postcode area of Kirkby, affecting properties in Faraday Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.26PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.39PM on 4th February 2021.
